title: Bloomberg Markets: It's Not Easy Being Green, Even For UC
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: It's Not Easy Being Green, Even For UC
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Janet Lorin Higher Education Reporter Bloomberg News Discussing University of California's sustainable investing by buying funds of stocks deemed green.
